DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine if rapid on-site evaluation of EBUS-TBNA samples can increase the percentage of patients with advanced non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer in whom both pathologic subtyping and mutational analysis are obtained.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Rapid On-site Evaluation for Mutational Analysis of EBUS-TBNA Specimens
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 years Suspected hilar or mediastinal lymph node metastasis from lung cancer Pregnancy Uncontrolled coagulopathy Refusal to sign informed consent
